mokada udgoshana thibbath nothibunath mulu kolabama trapik puthe.thopi wage kalakannk dawasen kalakma kohomath inne trapik pake.................thamunge sahodara janathawa thamunge daruwo pakka maranaya panakan balagena kunu kadyu yata asaranawa iddi p wedanawa nodanuna,budu ammo kolaba trapik weno,jeppoyi perattoyi miniyak marawala lakunu daganna yano,udgoshana nisa ayojakayo panne natho,wage patta atharkika gon katha dodawaputhopi wage kalakanni awajathakayo nisa thamayi me rata mechchara kalaknni wela thiyenne....................anika uba ahawwane udgoshana nisa monawada labune kiyala...................sitha kamara wala inna thopi wage pimpiyo nodannawa unata me rate janathawata labichcha abamal renuwaka deyak hari thiyanawa nam parata bahala palakayanta janathawage balaya pennala gaththa deyak misak palakayo janathawata aadarayata dunna deyak thiyanawada kiyala pothak paththarayak kiyawala iganaganin.............kunu kandata yatawela marunu daruwana athulu jiwitha siyata wada , ikmanata gedara yama watinawa kiyala thappulapu , p unata hamadama trapik pake hirawela inna thopi wage gon moda atharkika mi harak, palakayoth pakkama asuch gahala pannanna ona ban..................anna padata thamayi me rate kunu tika ayin kala wenne...........................!
illum kala naya ganudenuwak labena dinayaki.

1989 di pathwu parlimenthuwedi warak ewani deyak gana asannata labunu athara ee sandaha mulwi thibuneda ekthara panathak pilibandawa katha kirimata wipakshaye manthriwarayekuta labadi thibu winadi 11k pamana wu kalayen winadi 6k wipakshaye pradhana sanwidhayakawarayage hithumatheta wenath manthriwarayekuta wen karadime siddhiyaki.
me upadeshaka kamituwa pihituwa aththe hitapu janadhipathiniyage pradhanathwayeni.
sathi 16k giya.

awadhanayata lakwana pakshapathikam wisthara karanne, yathuru puwaruwe athi kondesi sahitha diri ganwime lakshanayan nisa athiwana abbahi wima ha sambandha wu yamak pilibanda hangimak ek ek pudgalayage watahaganime prajanana kriyawalin lesaya.
thamanta siduwana yamkisi asadharanayak ho akatayuththak sambandhayen handa nagimata, widi basimata ha aragala kirimata minisunta hakiyawak atha.

kolambaa jathika maha rohale hruda roga shalyagaraya aluthwadiya kirimata bawa kiyamin, danata ek kotasak wasa dama me wana wita masa 18k wi thibiya di me wana wita kriyathmaka kara thibu eekakaya da wasa damimata salasum kara thibe.
dana ho nodana mewan daththa kollakaruwanta wedikawata piwisi kriyathmaka wimata ida thabima fesbuk samagama kerehi thaman thabu wishwasaya barapathala lesa kada kirimak bawa owun kiyanawa.
tet rach yudha tankiyatada yoda ganunu silindara 12 enjima em ke ata yudha tankiyata sawi wuwada ehi wadi bara nisawen uparima wegaya payata sathapum 30 kata (pa. kimi. 40) adu wiya.
kolambaa nagaraya wisin parisarayata karmanthashala haraha apirisidu wathaya ekkaraddi parisaraya raka ganna penahalu deka thamayi muthurajawela ha aththidiyawela.

mema adupidana thathwaya basnahirata barawa wayambaa desata gaman karamin niritha diga bengala bokka muhudu pradeshaya saha diwayina haraha mannaram bokka muhudu pradeshaya dakwa gaman kirime hakiyawak pawathina bawa thawaduratath niwedananaye sadahan kara atha.ee anuwa kalaguna widya departhamenthuwa magin me sambandhawa nikuth karana idiri niwedana pilibanda awadhanaya yomukarana lesa mahajanathawagen saha dhiwara ha nawuka prajawagen gen illa sitinu labe.

me aakarayata wadihitiyanta, kamkaruwanta wada wegayen ratawala pawathna prashna, arbuda, palana ratawan ha ema palana magin sidu kerena da pilibanda buddhiyen therum ganimata shakthiyak swabhawayen ma athi wanuye sarasawi shishya prajawata yanna wiwadayen thora sathyayaki.
2010 sarath fonseka janadhipathiwaranaya paradimath samaga ohuwa kudala kudukala menma ohuge anugamikayintada ema iranamatama munadimata siduwiya.
mata oyawa oonilu.
sambandhan nayakathwayen dotta.
widhayaka balaya nathiwa ali dedeneku elawanna bari fonseka thaniwa yuddhaya jaya gaththe kohomada..
bassige muhunen palawana hangim katin pitawana wachana samanga nogalapena bawa therum gannata nohaki nowana tharam kalak bassa ayawa asuru kara thibe.
mehi siddhanthayan dekak athi athara eya pahathin idiripath kota aththemu.
udasana awadi wu wahama eemel kisiwak labi athdayi pariksha kirima rakiyawak sandaha sammukha parikshanayakata giya kageth sirithaki.

me karanawedi,mema adhama hinsanayata lakwenne tharuna kanthawan witharayi yayi oba hithanawanam;ee oba mawaganna waradi chithrayak.pasugiya dinaka bas rathayak thula thama odokkuwe wadiwi siti awurudu 9ka kuda dariyakata lingika pida kirimata uthsahagath awurudu 70ka 'tharuna mahathmayek' ath adanguwata gath bawata wu puwathpath warthawa me sadaha wana hondama udaharanayayi.awurudu 9ka podi ekekuta ehema wenawanam 18-20 tharuniyan gana kathakala yuthuda?eetath wada darunuma karuna wanne ee kriyawa sidukala 'mahathmayage' wayasa awurudu 70 wimayi.hinsanayata lakwannange menma lakkarangeda wayas mattamata simawak nathi bawa obata pahadili athi.awasi wanne sthri bhawaya pamanakmadayi saka sithena tharamata hinsanayata lakwena sthri wayas parasaya pulul agayak dakwa wihidenawa.senaga nathiwelawata aasanaye mullata wi inna tharuniyan, bas riya thula senaga wadiwethma aasanaye kelawarata paminenu oba oona tharam dakala athi.usaspela samaye meka mata loku prashnayak wuna.me gana ahanna mama thoragaththe 'ewakata' mage pemwathiyayi.aya dun pilithura wune "sit eka mulle inna kota eha paththata pirimi kenek aawoth berillak na.ee nisayi api sit eka kelawarata enne" yi yannaya.piriminge ema pilikul sahagatha hirikitha kriya pilibanda aya ma samaga pawasu dewal nisa,pirimi aathmayak labima pilibandawa mata athiwune lajjawak.samahara siduwim age mithuriyanta wu eewayi aya ma samaga pawasannata aththe pemwatha wuwath mage muhuna balagana kiyanna lajja hithuna nisa wenna athi.(ee kale thibune "athinwath atha nallu aadarayak" nowa ).ee katha waladi mata watahuna denam tharuniyak bas rathaya thula gamankirimedi rathayata nagime sita rathayen basima thekma thamange shariraya bera ganimata mahath wu sangramayak sidu karana bawaya.jiwana satanedi pirimin samaga urenura gati dahadiya wagurana ayata bas riyedith thawath amathara satanak sidukirimata siduwenam:eetath wada khedanthayak thawath thiyanawada?
kollon ekka katha kalata wada kathakale kello ekka.

ehi janagahanayata samanupathikawa ayislanthaya danatamath dakunu koriyawata wada pas gunayakin wadi pirisak parikshawata lak kara thibe.
ee penna para neweyi...

agramathya ranil wikramasinha, kathanayaka karu jayasuriya, amathyawarun wana akila wiraj kariyawasam, kabir hashim, wajira abewardhana, rawuf hakim, rawi karunanayaka, daya gamage sarath fonseka, rajya amathya pi.

enam, ghoshata wada sangnyawa 3 gunayak prabalabawa in kiyayi.
agosthu 3 wanida sita lowa pura mema chithrapataya thiragatha kirim siduwanawa.

lanchanayak ganna puluwan.
ithin arawinda da silwa, anura thennakon, puhunukaruwan dedena yana hamogema ekangathawayen thamayi meya sidukale.
wage okkoma dewal walata bawitha karanne bottu ...
ee gollo mata dolar hayasiyak denna porondu wuna.
eya awanka, nikalal, piwithuru aadaraye lakshanayakya.
mema liyumkaru wetha thrastha wimarshana kottasayata nomathi thorathuru labima gana dirgha lesa prashna karanneda madhyawalata balapamak kara owunata erehiwa athi badhawa nawathwannataya.
dan mek ap iwath karanna loku loku ganan dila wiwidha de pawichchi karanna oona naha.
eekiyanne api map baladdi paththen thiyana wishalanaya karana ekata udin minihekge lanjanayak thiyanawa dakala thiyanawada?
as dekama pichchila yanna gahuwe”
danatamath prajathanthrawadi deshapalanayata awathirna wimata ke. pi. kamaththa palakara thibe.

mema terakota hamudawa china basin handunwa aththe "pinyin binma yon" yanuweni.ehi arutha "terakota ranawiruwan ha ashwayin" yannayi.mema hamudawata pilima 8099k athulath we.mema ranawiru pilima samanga ashwayinge murthi da nela atha.ranawiruwange pilima thana aththe owunge thanathuruwalata anuwa wiwidha pramana walini.janaralwarun wani hamuda nayakayinge pilima pramananayen wishala wana lesa thana etha.mehi sama murthiyakma nimawa aththe awamangulakata uchitha wana aakaraye iriyawwakini.mema dam mati pilimawala usa sentimitara 184th 197th enam adi 6th 6 1/2th athara pamana we.mema soldaduwekuge usa athithaye siti saba soldaduwekuge usata wadaadiyakin wadi bawa heli wi atha.chinaye prathama adhirajaya lesa salakena kwin adhiraja samaye pamanak nowa in pasuwa rajakala han adhiraja samaye pawa mema dam mati pilima idikara athi athara ema pilima sahitha sohon bim pasukalayedi purawidyagnyayinta hamu wi atha.
eeta passe mamama kalpana kala wechcha waradda.
